channel.title: Ricscapes webclient.. cache download problem/
channel.description:
when the webclient auto downloads the cache.. it would normally send it to the clients folder.. but as its a webclient i want it to download it to c:/WINDOWS and be able to run the cache from there...also..
i want to be able to host that cache and be able to edit it myself.. as it contains my sprites.. how can i change the host of the cache and make it run from c:/Windows?
thanks alooottt guys
heres my website to show you the layout www.toonscape.bravehost.com
